reviews.title: The Best iPad Pro Keyboard Cases
reviews.author: by Roderick Scott and Nick Guy
reviews.brief: If you want to turn your iPad Pro into a laptop, you need a keyboard case. Our favorite is much cheaper than Apple’s option.

reviews.title: The Best Wireless HDMI Video Transmitter
reviews.author: by Adrienne Maxwell
reviews.brief: If you want to send HDMI signals wirelessly instead of through cables, the Nyrius Aries Home+ performs reliably and has more features than the competition.

reviews.title: The Best Drawing Tablets
reviews.author: by Arthur Gies
reviews.brief: Drawing tablets are nearly indispensable for creating art on a PC or laptop, and models such as the Huion Inspiroy 2 M are great for beginners and veteran artists alike.

reviews.title: The Best Wireless Portable Chargers and Power Banks
reviews.author: by Sarah Witman
reviews.brief: ESR’s HaloLock Kickstand MagSafe Battery Pack can wirelessly charge most phones up to three times, and its built-in kickstand is among the sturdiest we’ve seen.

reviews.title: The Best Qi Wireless Charger for iPhone and Android Phones
reviews.author: by Sarah Witman
reviews.brief: The Belkin BoostCharge Pro is your best bet for charging a single device wirelessly. It has MagSafe capabilities, a long cord, and a handy built-in stand.

reviews.title: The Best iPad Pro Keyboard Cases
reviews.author: by Roderick Scott and Nick Guy
reviews.brief: No matter where you want to mount your phone in your car, we have plenty of options to keep it safely in view while you’re driving.
